RT @Lyncherator Senate's Judiciary Committee will be voting this morning on @CoryBooker's bipartisan bill to protect the Special Counsel from political interference. Follow along here ---->
https://www.c-span.org/video/?444397-1/senate-judiciary-committee-vote-bill-protect-special-counsel

BREAKING: A bipartisan bill to protect the Special Counsel just passed the Senate Judiciary Committee. This bill should go to the Senate floor for a vote immediately. Americans deserve to know where their elected leaders stand. This is about the endurance of our democracy.
Congratulations to Secretary of State Pompeo, who will provide crucial leadership during this increasingly perilous time across the world.
I hope its passage through the Judiciary Committee serves as a clear sign that protecting the special counsel and America's democracy is of the utmost importance. 3/
